<js>
dc=["玄幻","xuanhuan","奇幻","qihuan","武侠","wuxia","仙侠","xianxia","都市","dushi","轻改","qing","历史","lishi","军事","junshi","游戏","youxi","科幻","kehuan","灵异","lingyi","言情","yanqing","耽美","danmei","当代","dangdai","侦探","zhentan","儿童","ertong","名著","mingzhu","励志","lizhi","悬疑","xuanyi","经管","jingguan","同人","tongren","传记","zhuanji","散文","sanwen","外国","waiguo","畅销","chuban","杂志","zazhi","漫画","manhua","纪实","jishi","幽默","youmo","健康","health","诗集","poetry","学习","xuexi","心理","xinli","宗教","foxue","哲学","zhexue","旅游","travel","科普","kepu","育儿","yuer","女性","woman","文化","culture","官场","guanchang","青春","youth","网络","net","国学","guoxue","逻辑","logic","创业","chuangye","次元","erciyuan","英文","english","其他","other"];x="";
for(i=0;i<dc.length/2;i++){
x+=dc[i*2]+"::/"+dc[i*2+1]+"{,searchPage}.html&&";
}
tmp="连载::/lianzai/&&完结::/wanjie/&&";
result=tmp+x;
</js>

ruleChapterName:
@JSon:$.title

result.replace(/[（［【\[\{\(].*?[更合字修费求票赏鲜盟推歉谢祝节年].*?[）］】\]\}\)]$/,"").replace(/^(\S+\h)?第?(\d{3,4})(、|\.|\s|$)/,"第$2章 ").replace(/\S+\s(第(\d{1,4}|[一二三四五六七八九十百千]{1,7})[章节话回折]|(内容)?简介|卷首语|楔子|前言|序[言章]?|终章|后记|附录)/,"$1")
